item.title: The War Trump Repeatedly Promised To End In 24 Hours Still Rages A Year Later — And It Won’t End This Year Either
item.description: At least 53 times Trump said he would settle the war between Russia and Ukraine quickly.

item.title: Trump’s Recent Tariff Edicts Seem To Ignore The Supreme Court’s Skepticism
item.description: Imposing tariffs over a personal snub hardly qualifies as an international emergency or a threat to U.S. interests.

item.title: Pfizer Pockets $1.9B by Offloading Stake in HIV Drugs Company Majority Owned by GSK
item.description: Pfizer’s stake in ViiV Healthcare will be taken over by Shiongi, another minority shareholder in the HIV medicines company.
